issues.title: Healthcare Access
issues.description: Support for expanding affordable healthcare coverage, protecting pre-existing conditions, and reducing prescription drug costs

issues.title: Climate Change Action
issues.description: Strong support for green energy transition, reducing carbon emissions, and investing in sustainable infrastructure

issues.title: Economic Opportunity
issues.description: Advocacy for raising minimum wage, supporting small businesses, and creating job training programs

issues.title: Immigration Reform
issues.description: Support for comprehensive immigration reform, path to citizenship, and protecting DACA recipients

issues.title: Education Investment
issues.description: Prioritizing increased funding for public education, student debt relief, and workforce development programs

issues.title: Gun Safety Legislation
issues.description: Support for universal background checks, assault weapons restrictions, and gun violence prevention

issues.title: Reproductive Rights
issues.description: Strong pro-choice stance, supporting women's healthcare access and protecting reproductive freedoms
